description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Eliminate Tooth Pain Using Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • The psychological reasons behind tooth pain
  • You will be able to eliminate tooth pain with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • You will be able to relax instantly using self hypnosis techniques
  • You will be able to reduce stress, depression , insomnia and negativity using powerful self hypnosis and affirmations

This course is a must for those who are suffering from tooth pain and are completely negative because they are unable to reduce the pain mentally and physically

It is ideal for everyone who want to eliminate tooth pain and improve their health overall.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1:Introduction

Lecture 2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6:Guided Visualization Exercise : To Eliminate Tooth Pain

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 9:Bonus Exercise : General Healing Audio File
title: Hypnosis- Eliminate Tooth Pain Using Self Hypnosis
